    Class Description
    App
    This class is utilised to run the app.
    FlooringAuditDao  
    FlooringAuditDaoImpl
    This method is utilised, to log all the user interactions and updates.
    FlooringController
    This is the controller, that manages the app usage.
    FlooringMasteryView
    This is the class that interacts with the user, by displaying/printing all the relevant messages.
    FlooringOrderDao  
    FlooringOrderDaoImpl
    This is the flooring order DAO class which manages the files in memory returning all the relevant information require for the app to run
    FlooringServiceLayer  
    FlooringServiceLayerImpl
    This is the service layer, which handles interactions between the controller and DAOs.
    NoSuchOrderException
    This exception is utilised if an order cannot be found in the respective order file.
    NoSuchOrderFileException
    This exception is utilised if an order cannot be found when using the the order date.
    Order
    This class handles the Order details.
    OrderCancelledException  
    OrderPersistenceException
    If a particular file cannot be found e.g.
    Product  
    Taxes
    This class handles all the tax values per state
    UserIO
    This is the user interface, outlining the methods of which the app will obtain information from the user.
